description: This file implements a minimal API client for a React frontend project, providing functions for making fetch requests with timeouts, retries, and specific post/health check functionalities.

methods.name: getApiBase()
methods.description: Resolves the API base URL based on environment variables, window location, or default localhost.

methods.name: fetchWithTimeout(url, options = {}, timeoutMs = DEFAULT_TIMEOUT_MS)
methods.description: Performs a fetch request with enforced timeout, retries for transient errors, and structured error surfaces.

methods.name: postChat(arg1, arg2, arg3)
methods.description: Posts messages to the chat endpoint with enforced timeout, allowing for explicit base URL or using the default environment-based URL.

methods.name: healthCheck(timeoutMs = 5000)
methods.description: Performs a simple health check GET request to verify backend connectivity.

ctags.name: fetchWithTimeout
ctags.pattern: /^ export async function fetchWithTimeout(url, options = {}, timeoutMs = DEFAULT_TIMEOUT_MS) {$/

ctags.name: postChat
ctags.pattern: /^ export async function postChat(arg1, arg2, arg3) {$/
